Title: kimocsys
Description:
KiMoCSys stands for Kinect Motion Capture System.

It captures the movement using the kinect hardware  and kinect SDK for windows and generates a Collada file with the animation inside.

Intended for indie game developers and enthusiasts.

Use WPF and C#
HomeWiki:
Project Description
-- Still in development. No functional code yet ------

KiMoCSys stands for Kinect Motion Capture System.

It captures the movement using the kinect hardware and kinect SDK for windows and generates a Collada file with the animation inside.

Intended for indie game developers and enthusiasts.

Use WPF and C#
